customerReview-save.title: Save changes
customerReview-save.message: The review has been modified. Do you want to save changes?

review-delete.title: Delete review
review-delete.message: This action may result in a rating change. Are you sure you want to delete review?

permissions.customerReviews:update: Approve, reject, and reset review status

CustomerReviewEmailNotification.description: The customer gets an email notification when the order is completed and the customer does not leave any product feedback

CustomerReviewsEnabled.title: Product reviews activation
CustomerReviewsEnabled.description: Enable/ disable to allow/prohibit customers to provide feedback and reviews for products

CustomerReviewsEnabledForAnonymous.title: Anonymous product reviews
CustomerReviewsEnabledForAnonymous.description: Enable/ disable the ability for non-registered users to submit product reviews

CanSubmitReviewWhenHasOrder.title: Only buyers of the product can create new reviews
CanSubmitReviewWhenHasOrder.description: Enable to restrict review submissions to customers who have bought the product

Calculation.Method.title: Rating calculation method
Calculation.Method.description: Select the method to determine ratings

CustomerReviewsEnabledRequestReviewJob.title: Automatic activation of review request emails
CustomerReviewsEnabledRequestReviewJob.description: Enable/ disable job that sends review request emails to customers after their order remains in a specific state for a defined number of days

CustomerReviewsRequestReviewCronJob.title: Cron expression for email job execution
CustomerReviewsRequestReviewCronJob.description:
Set to schedule review request email job. Examples:
- Run the task every X minutes: "0/x * * * *"
- Run it every X hours at the 00 minute mark: "0 */X * * *"
- Specify minutes: "15 */x * * *"
- Run it every X days at midnight: "0 0 */x * *"

CustomerReviewsRequestReviewDaysInState.title: Days before transitioning order state
CustomerReviewsRequestReviewDaysInState.description: Specify the number of days an order stays in a state before a transition is triggered

CustomerReviewsRequestReviewOrderInState.title: Order state for review request
CustomerReviewsRequestReviewOrderInState.description: Specify the order state that triggers automatic review request emails to customers

CustomerReviewsRequestReviewMaxRequests.title: Maximum e-mails sent to customer
CustomerReviewsRequestReviewMaxRequests.description: Limit the maximum number of review request emails sent to a customer within a specified timeframe
